00081 static inline struct os_process *os_task_get_process(struct os_task *task) {

00091 static inline void os_task_set_priority(struct os_task *task, enum os_priority priority) {

00093 }
00099 static inline enum os_priority os_task_get_priority(struct os_task *task) {
00100     return os_process_get_priority(os_task_get_process(task));
00101 }

00108 static inline void os_task_delete(struct os_task *task) {
00109     os_process_disable(os_task_get_process(task));
00110     // Free the task stack if needed
00111     if (!(task->options & OS_TASK_USE_CUSTOM_STACK)) {
00112         extern void os_free(os_ptr_t ptr);
00113         os_free(task->stack);
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00121 static inline void os_task_enable(struct os_task *task) {
00122     os_process_enable(os_task_get_process(task));
00123 }
00124 
00129 static inline void os_task_disable(struct os_task *task) {
00130     os_process_disable(os_task_get_process(task));
00131 }
00132 
00138 static inline bool os_task_is_enabled(struct os_task *task) {
00139     return os_process_is_enabled(os_task_get_process(task));
